feed.title: Nextcloud News Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud News: 21.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Build(deps): Bump skjnldsv/read-package-engines-version-actions from 2.0 to 2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2169
  • store useragent in one place by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2168
  • Use httpLastModified field for If-Modified-Since header on feed updates by @rwunderer in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2119
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump minimatch from 7.4.2 to 7.4.3 in /js by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2172
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.10.7 to 1.10.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2174
  • Test the updater. by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/1961
  • Release 21.2.0-beta1 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2170
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.10.8 to 1.10.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2178
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan-strict-rules from 1.5.0 to 1.5.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2179
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan-phpunit from 1.3.10 to 1.3.11 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2177
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpunit/phpunit from 9.6.5 to 9.6.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2176
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump minimatch from 7.4.3 to 8.0.2 in /js by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2181
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.10.9 to 1.10.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2182
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump minimatch from 8.0.2 to 8.0.3 in /js by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2184
  • Fix: set lastmodified in items->readAll by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2183
  • Release 21.2.0-beta2 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2186
  • Build(deps): Bump fivefilters/readability.php from 3.1.4 to 3.1.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2189
  • fix integration tests by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2201
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.10.10 to 1.10.13 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2197
  • Fix display issue in NC26+ (#2192) by @ManuelSailer in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2196
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpunit/phpunit from 9.6.6 to 9.6.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2198
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump doctrine/dbal from 3.6.1 to 3.6.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2199
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump minimatch from 8.0.3 to 9.0.0 in /js by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2191
  • Improve sql query performance by removing unused payload by @starze in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2195
  • Release 21.2.0-beta3 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2202
  • Ignore Visual Studio Code settings by @ManuelSailer in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2204
  • Fix sorting of folder names in select when adding subscription by @ManuelSailer in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2205
  • Fix audio player floating when scrolling by @ManuelSailer in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2206
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/extension-installer from 1.2.0 to 1.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2208
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.10.13 to 1.10.14 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2210
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump karma-chrome-launcher from 3.1.1 to 3.2.0 in /js by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2212
  • Release 21.2.0-beta4 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2209
  • Improve visibility of links in dark theme (#2215) by @chylex in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2216
  • Build(deps): Bump engine.io and socket.io in /js by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2220
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump karma from 6.4.1 to 6.4.2 in /js by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2214
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan-doctrine from 1.3.37 to 1.3.38 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2221
  • add more sleep commands by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2224
  • Release 21.2.0 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2222

New Contributors

  • @rwunderer made their first contribution in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2119
  • @ManuelSailer made their first contribution in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2196
  • @starze made their first contribution in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2195

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/news/compare/21.1.0...21.2.0

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud News: 22.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.10.14 to 1.10.15 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2230
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan-doctrine from 1.3.38 to 1.3.40 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2232
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpunit/phpunit from 9.6.7 to 9.6.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2231
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump jquery from 3.6.4 to 3.7.0 in /js by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2233
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump jasmine-core from 4.6.0 to 5.0.0 in /js by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2235
  • Remove/nc24 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2223
  • Release 22.0.0-beta1 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2239
  • add testing on stable27 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2241
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump minimatch from 9.0.0 to 9.0.1 in /js by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2243
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan-phpunit from 1.3.11 to 1.3.12 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2244
  • Build(deps): Bump svenstaro/upload-release-action from 2.5.0 to 2.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2247
  • Build(deps): Bump socket.io-parser from 4.2.2 to 4.2.3 in /js by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2245
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/extension-installer from 1.3.0 to 1.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2246
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan-phpunit from 1.3.12 to 1.3.13 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2249
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.10.15 to 1.10.18 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2257
  • Build(deps): Bump fast-xml-parser from 4.1.3 to 4.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2256
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump doctrine/dbal from 3.6.2 to 3.6.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2255
  • Build(deps): Bump skjnldsv/read-package-engines-version-actions from 2.1 to 2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2252
  • Build(deps): Bump svenstaro/upload-release-action from 2.6.0 to 2.6.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2251
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump jasmine-core from 5.0.0 to 5.0.1 in /js by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2258
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpunit/phpunit from 9.6.8 to 9.6.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2259
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.10.18 to 1.10.19 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2260
  • Build(deps): Bump fivefilters/readability.php from 3.1.5 to 3.1.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2261
  • allowEvalScript set to true by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2262
  • 22.0.0-beta2 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2263
  • Use HTTP compression for downloads by @Mynacol in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2269
  • Build(deps): Bump fast-xml-parser from 4.2.4 to 4.2.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2281
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump minimatch from 9.0.1 to 9.0.3 in /js by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2279
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.10.19 to 1.10.25 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2280
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump karma-coverage from 2.2.0 to 2.2.1 in /js by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2271
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump doctrine/dbal from 3.6.3 to 3.6.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2272
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpunit/phpunit from 9.6.9 to 9.6.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2283
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.10.25 to 1.10.26 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2291
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump word-wrap from 1.2.3 to 1.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2290
  • install.md minor grammar changes by @jboucher614 in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2288
  • Updating FAQ to multiple MD files by @hydrian in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2286
  • Release 22.0.0 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2294

New Contributors

  • @Mynacol made their first contribution in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2269
  • @jboucher614 made their first contribution in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2288
  • @hydrian made their first contribution in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2286

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/news/compare/21.2.0...22.0.0

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud News: 23.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Build(deps-dev): Bump doctrine/dbal from 3.6.4 to 3.6.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2297
  • Drop support for PHP 7.4 new min. version is php 8.0 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2237
  • Upgrade feed-io to v5.1.3 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2238
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump jasmine-core from 5.0.1 to 5.1.0 in /js by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2298
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.10.27 to 1.10.28 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2308
  • Build(deps): Bump svenstaro/upload-release-action from 2.6.1 to 2.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2300
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan-doctrine from 1.3.41 to 1.3.42 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2309
  • Release 23.0.0-beta1 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2310
  • fix codecoverage never executed by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2314
  • Fix/docs by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2315
  • Release 23.0.0 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2318

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/news/compare/22.0.0...23.0.0

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud News: 24.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix link to not existing faq by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2319
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump doctrine/dbal from 3.6.5 to 3.6.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2322
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.10.28 to 1.10.29 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2317
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpunit/phpunit from 9.6.10 to 9.6.11 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2327
  • drop support for Nextcloud 25 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2316
  • Add a command to check the job status and reset it by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2166
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.10.29 to 1.10.30 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2332
  • Check available compression types of curl by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2328
  • use unique name for cache folder by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2331
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump jasmine-core from 5.1.0 to 5.1.1 in /js by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2334
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan-phpunit from 1.3.13 to 1.3.14 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2336
  • Release 24.0.0-beta1 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2337
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump jquery from 3.7.0 to 3.7.1 in /js by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2342
  • Build(deps): Bump actions/checkout from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2349
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan-doctrine from 1.3.42 to 1.3.43 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2348
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.10.33 to 1.10.35 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2356
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpunit/phpunit from 9.6.11 to 9.6.13 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2355
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump doctrine/dbal from 3.6.6 to 3.6.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2358
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump doctrine/dbal from 3.6.7 to 3.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2362
  • Release 24.0.0 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2359

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/news/compare/23.0.0...24.0.0

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud News: 25.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Vue Rewrite] Fix CI Jobs by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/1816
  • [Vue Rewrite] Enable Typescript Vue Components by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/1831
  • [Vue Rewrite] Clean up indentation + linting rules by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/1907
  • [Vue Rewrite] Move Component Files to Typescript by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/1922
  • [Vue Rewrite] Add Jest for Unit tests by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/1968
  • [Vue Rewrite] Upmerge Recent Changes by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/1982
  • [Vue Rewrite] Add Unit Tests for Admin Settings by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/1998
  • [Vue Rewrite] Start Vuex store by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2010
  • [Vue Rewrite] Start More Routes by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2024
  • [Vue Rewrite] Upmerge Release 22 into Vue Rewrite Branch by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2305
  • [Vue Rewrite] Add Feed Component by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2306
  • [Vue Rewrite] Starred component by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2321
  • [Vue Rewrite] Add Unread Item Route and switch to 3 panel-layout by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2333
  • [Vue Rewrite] Single Feed Route using FeedItemDisplayList component by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2339
  • [Vue Rewrite] Fetch Item Bugfix + other cleanup by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2343
  • [Vue Rewrite] Routes: Folder and All Articles Components and Routes by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2346
  • [Vue Rewrite] Sidebar Feed/Folder Actions by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2354
  • update php setup action by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2364
  • [Vue Rewrite] BugFix (Feed Actions) + Warning Message + subscribe_to URL parameter by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2360
  • [Vue Rewrite] Share Article Component by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2361
  • [Vue Rewrite] Audio/Video playback from enclosures in FeedItem by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2366
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.10.35 to 1.10.37 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2369
  • [Vue Rewrite] Basic Error Handling and Display by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2370
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.10.37 to 1.10.38 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2373
  • Log more useful things when checking a logo by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2379
  • [Vue Rewrite] Explore Page styles and behavior by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2376
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan-phpunit from 1.3.14 to 1.3.15 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2375
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump doctrine/dbal from 3.7.0 to 3.7.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2372
  • [Vue Rewrite] Basic Mobile accessible interface by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2371
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump @babel/traverse from 7.18.5 to 7.23.2 in /js by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2382
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump @babel/traverse from 7.21.2 to 7.23.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2383
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.10.38 to 1.10.39 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2384
  • Fix: Set CURLOPT_USERAGENT for Scraper by @IgorA100 in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2380
  • [Vue Rewrite] Fix css issues and start updating docs by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2381
  • [Vue Rewrite] Upmerge Branch from Master to clean up Merge Conflicts by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2385
  • Vue rewrite by @JonathanTreffler in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/748
  • Build(deps): Bump arthurhoaro/favicon from 1.3.3 to 2.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2386
  • Adjust Makefile, Changelog and more by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2390
  • Build(deps): Bump actions/checkout from 2 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2393
  • Build(deps): Bump actions/setup-node from 1 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2392
  • Release 25.0.0-alpha1 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2396
  • Build(deps): Bump debril/feed-io from 5.3.1 to 5.3.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2398
  • Build(deps): Bump browserify-sign from 4.2.1 to 4.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2400
  • Don't build frontend code to save CI time when only running PHP tests by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2403
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan-doctrine from 1.3.43 to 1.3.45 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2404
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.10.39 to 1.10.40 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2406
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan-strict-rules from 1.5.1 to 1.5.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2405
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.10.40 to 1.10.41 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2411
  • fix merge errors by @anoymouserver in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2410
  • Adjust search urls to match changed Vue routes by @anoymouserver in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2409
  • Vue improvements by @powerpaul17 in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2401
  • fix dbal deprecations by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2413
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan-doctrine from 1.3.45 to 1.3.46 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2416
  • Build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/dialogs from 3.2.0 to 4.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2415
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump @nextcloud/browserslist-config from 2.3.0 to 3.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2394
  • Build(deps): Bump @babel/traverse from 7.22.8 to 7.23.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2418
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump axios from 1.4.0 to 1.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2417
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump jest-serializer-vue from 2.0.2 to 3.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2391
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump webpack-merge from 5.9.0 to 5.10.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2422
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump @babel/preset-typescript from 7.22.5 to 7.23.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2421
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump eslint-plugin-standard from 4.1.0 to 5.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2420
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump eslint-plugin-vue from 9.16.1 to 9.18.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2419
  • Release 25.0.0-alpha2 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2412
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump phpstan/phpstan-doctrine from 1.3.46 to 1.3.47 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2424
  • Build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/l10n from 1.6.0 to 2.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2426
  • Build(deps): Bump vue and vue-template-compiler by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2427
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump @babel/core from 7.22.9 to 7.23.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2428
